title: Micron (MU) Stock Jumps for Second Day After Nvidia (NVDA) Mention
text:
Micron Technologies (MU) is climbing for a second straight day after Nvidia (NVDA) noted that it was using MU’s chips in its new products. After advancing...
By: Yahoo Entertainment Jan 09 2025 32 6020 Views Micron (MU) Stock Jumps for Second Day After Nvidia (NVDA) Mention Micron Technologies (MU) is climbing for a second straight day after Nvidia (NVDA) noted that it was using MU's chips in its new products.
